handgunKnowledge.name: Handgun Knowledge
handgunKnowledge.description: Knowledge of how to use handguns, thus removing 50% penalty to hit targets.

shotgunKnowledge.name: Shotgun Knowledge
shotgunKnowledge.description: Knowledge of how to use shotguns, thus removing 50% penalty to hit targets.

machineGunKnowledge.name: Machine Gun Knowledge
machineGunKnowledge.description: Knowledge of how to use machine guns, thus removing 50% penalty to hit targets.

mine.name: Mine
mine.description: Use a pickaxe to mine in certain locations (rocky mounds) in order to find rocks, gems, precious metals, etc.

sureShot.name: Sure Shot
sureShot.description: Improved accuracy with all guns (bonus to Agility when shooting with any gun).

quickReload.name: Quick Reload
quickReload.description: Reload a handgun without using an action.

keenInvestigation.name: Keen Investigation
keenInvestigation.description: Improved chance of finding secrets for the party when doing a search.

steadyHand.name: Steady Hand
steadyHand.description: Improved accuracy with handguns (bonus to Agility when shooting with a handgun).

expertMining.name: Expert Mining
expertMining.description: Allows the archaeologist to mine much more quickly. If not enough Spirit, only the normal Mine skill will be available.

betterLivingThroughChemicals.name: Better Living Through Chemicals
betterLivingThroughChemicals.description: Use Pharmaceuticals on self with increased effectiveness (more Sanity recovered).

resuscitate.name: Resuscitate
resuscitate.description: Adjacent party member at 0 health is brought back to life at 5 health if skill is used within 3 turns of target being mortally wounded.

medicalExpertise.name: Medical Expertise
medicalExpertise.description: Improved healing with First Aid Kits.

comfortTheFearful.name: Comfort The Fearful
comfortTheFearful.description: Comfort the party with calming words and presence to reduce Sanity damage to the party for a number of turns while in Tactical Mode.

spiritualInspiration.name: Spiritual Inspiration
spiritualInspiration.description: Use both actions (and amazing words of inspiration) to recover some Spirit for the party.

feelThePain.name: Feel The Pain
feelThePain.description: For the next Psychic attack that reduces Sanity, Sanity reduction is converted to 2x Health damage, ignoring any health damage reductions.

goBallistic.name: Go Ballistic
goBallistic.description: Use all remaining ammo in gun to shoot target with reduced accuracy (reduced percent to attack roll).

attackFromTheShadows.name: Attack From The Shadows
attackFromTheShadows.description: While Stealthy, increased hit chance and damage with melee attacks.

stealthy.name: Stealthy
stealthy.description: Less likely to be hit when not equipped with a light (bonus to Agility when attacked) and allows Attack From The Shadows; • Drains Spirit with each move or action; • Doesn't require an action to activate or deactivate; • Only usable in Tactical Mode.

disarmTrap.name: Disarm Trap
disarmTrap.description: Disarm a trap without chance of it triggering.

identifyRelic.name: Identify Relic
identifyRelic.description: Discern what a Relic does (item must be in inventory).

sacrificialStrike.name: Sacrificial Strike
sacrificialStrike.description: Guaranteed hit and extra damage with Kris Knife in exchange for health and sanity loss.

relicExpertise.name: Relic Expertise
relicExpertise.description: Suffer less Sanity loss when using Relics.

krisKnifeExpertise.name: Kris Knife Expertise
krisKnifeExpertise.description: Knowledge of how to strike with precision in order to do the most damage possible.
